articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Shafali Verma stars as India hammer Nepal by 82 runs, seal place in Women's Asia Cup semifinal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India sealed their spot in the semifinals with a dominating 82-run win over Nepal in their final group match of the women's Asia Cup on Tuesday. | Crickit
articles.content: Explosive opener Shafali Verma slammed a career-best 48-ball 81 as defending champions India thrashed minnows Nepal by 82 runs in their final group match to confirm their semifinal spot at the Women'… [+3329 chars]
